title: Recent Rereleases: Moravia, Brandywine, Gaiseric, Stuttgart
content:
We've recently updated several of our older fonts. The most recent of these are:

[Moravia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013045853/http:/www.fontcraft.com/fontcraft/?p=1374) - based on unique poster lettering by Alphons Mucha.

[Brandywine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013045853/http:/www.fontcraft.com/fontcraft/?p=1816) - based on original book caption lettering by legendary Amercian artist Howard Pyle.

[Gaiseric](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013045853/http:/www.fontcraft.com/fontcraft/?p=1883) - an update of one of my original font designs first released in 1998 and subsequently used in the Spiderwick books.

[Stuttgart Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013045853/http:/www.fontcraft.com/fontcraft/?p=1945) - based on 19th century calligraphy samples originally developed from early printed type.

Many of the updates include added characters and other refinements.
author: dave nalle

comments.content: i like the new redesign of your site! It's clean and easy to navagate!
